sentences.en: Her family is Portuguese in origin.
sentences.cn: 她的家族是葡萄牙血统.

sentences.en: If it's possible, track the rumour back to its origin.
sentences.cn: 如果可能，应追查谣言的源头。

sentences.en: It has an origin lost in the mists of antiquity.
sentences.cn: 由于年代久远,其渊源已无法考证.

sentences.en: Living conditions are vastly different from those pertaining in their country of origin.
sentences.cn: 生活条件与他们祖国大不相同。

sentences.en: Many words in the English language are French in origin.
sentences.cn: 英语中的许多词源于法语.

sentences.en: Most Australians are of British origin.
sentences.cn: 大部分澳大利亚人都是英国人的后裔.

sentences.en: Most of the thickeners are of plant origin.
sentences.cn: 大部分增稠剂来源于植物。

sentences.en: old folk tales of unknown origin
sentences.cn: 起源不明的古老民间传说

sentences.en: Population genetics owes its origin to Francis Galton.
sentences.cn: 体遗传学的创立应归功于弗朗西斯·高尔顿.

sentences.en: She never forgot her humble origins (= low class or social position ).
sentences.cn: 她从未忘记自己的卑微出身。

sentences.en: She was despised because she was of humble origin.
sentences.cn: 她因出身低贱而受到蔑视.

sentences.en: The tradition has its origins in the Middle Ages.
Their medical problems are basically physical in origin.
sentences.cn: 他们的病症主要是由于身体原因引起的。

sentences.en: There are many theories about the origin of life.
sentences.cn: 关于生命起源的学说有很多.

sentences.en: There are some areas of wetland which are of ancient origin.
sentences.cn: 有一些湿地在古代就形成了。

sentences.en: They are collecting this material at the points of origin.
sentences.cn: 他们正在产地收集这种材料.

sentences.en: What's the origin of your anxiety?

words.tran_cn: 原始的；最初的；独创的；新颖的
创意；独创性，创造力；原始；新奇

trans.tran_en: the place or situation in which something begins to exist
